page.title: 20OUR IMPRESSIONS OF L.MARNEY
page.content: Although Layer Marney is only a few miles from the large village of Tiptree and from the town of Colchester, nearly all the dwellings are away from the main road. This means that it is still very rural in appearance and in reality. It has little through traffic _ it is mostly local, agriculturally connected, commuter, or visitors to Layer Marney Towers. There is a small boatbuilding business specialising in fibre_glass construction and an antiques fair is sometimes held. Nearly all the people we spoke to reported very little village community life; the main problem being a lack of a centre to the village and no central meeting place. About five years ago there was a young mothers' group, but this does not exist now.There are twisting lanes with some houses at the end of tracks.
